successes.title: THE HALOGRAPH An Unusual Mechanical Automatic Watch by XERIC
successes.description: The HALOGRAPH Automatic is a living time machine. YOU are the power source.  Now the most funded mechanical watch in crowdfunding history! ORDER TODAY at WATCHISMO.COM

Pledges.description: HALOGRAPH CHRONO Quartz Early Bird. Save $110 off the expected retail price.  Your choice of these four colors:  Silver, Black, Gold or Rosegold.
HALOGRAPH CHRONO Quartz.  Save $100 off the expected retail price.  Your choice of these four colors:  Silver, Black, Gold or Rosegold.
NEW REWARD! HALOGRAPH CHRONO NAVY Quartz. Save $100 off the expected retail price.
NEW REWARD! HALOGRAPH CHRONO GUNMETAL Quartz. Save $100 off the expected retail price.
ORIGINAL XERISCOPE AUTOMATIC OPEN EDITION @ Kickstarter Early Bird Pricing.  Save $150 off the retail price.  Your choice of these five colors:  Silver, All Black, Gold, Tan or RoseGold.
XERISCOPE² SQUARED AUTOMATIC ROSEGOLD LIMITED EDITION (Individually numbered 101-300). Save $150 off the retail price.

NEW EARLY BIRD REWARD! XERISCOPE² SQUARED AUTOMATIC LIMITED EDITION (Individually numbered 101-300). Save $150 off the retail price. Your choice of these eight colors: Black, Silver, RoseGold, Black/Tan, Brown, All Black, Gunmetal, or Gold
HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC SILVER "FIRST 100" EDITION. (Specially engraved with "The First 100" and individually numbered 1-100). Save $130 off the expected retail price.

NEW REWARD!  HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC BLACK/GOLD "FIRST 100" EDITION (Specially engraved with "The First 100" and individually numbered 1-100). Save $130 off the expected retail price.
HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC SILVER LIMITED EDITION (Individually numbered 101-300). Save $100 off the expected retail price.
HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC ROSEGOLD LIMITED EDITION (Individually numbered 101-300). Save $100 off the expected retail price.

HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC BLACK/GOLD LIMITED EDITION. (individually numbered 101-300). Save $100 off the expected retail price.
HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC GUNMETAL LIMITED EDITION (Individually numbered 301-400). Save $100 off the expected retail price.
HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC SILVER LIMITED EDITION (Individually numbered 301-400). Save $100 off the expected retail price.

NEW DOUBLE PACK REWARD! You get a HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC LIMITED EDITION + a HALOGRAPH CHRONO QUARTZ. The HALOGRAPH Automatic will be individually numbered 101-300. Save $250 off the retail price. Your choice of ANY of the HALOGRAPH colors.

NEW DOUBLE PACK REWARD! HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC LIMITED EDITION + XERISCOPE² SQUARED AUTOMATIC LIMITED EDITION. Both watches will be individually numbered 101-300. Save $300 off the retail price. Your choice of ANY of the Reward colors.

NEW DOUBLE PACK REWARD! HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC LIMITED EDITION + ORIGINAL XERISCOPE AUTOMATIC OPEN EDITION. The HALOGRAPH will be individually numbered 101-300. Save $300 off the retail price. Your choice of ANY of the Reward colors.

NEW TRIPLE PACK XERIC COLLECTOR REWARD! Get all THREE (3) XERIC models: HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC LIMITED EDITION, XERISCOPE² SQUARED AUTOMATIC LIMITED EDITION, & ORIGINAL XERISCOPE AUTOMATIC OPEN EDITION. The HALOGRAPH & XERISCOPE² SQUARED watches will be individually numbered 101-300. Save $500 off the retail price. Your choice of ANY of the Reward colors.

NEW QUAD PACK XERIC COLLECTOR REWARD! Get all FOUR (4) XERIC models: HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC LIMITED EDITION, HALOGRAPH CHRONO QUARTZ, XERISCOPE² SQUARED AUTOMATIC LIMITED EDITION, & ORIGINAL XERISCOPE AUTOMATIC OPEN EDITION. The HALOGRAPH AUTOMATIC & XERISCOPE² SQUARED watches will be individually numbered 101-300. Save $630 off the retail price. Your choice of ANY of the Reward colors
